summary.span: 返回与通过引用传递的值关联的键的名称。

span.span: Returns the name of the key associated with the value passed by reference.
A null reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认实现旨在由派生类重写，以便返回与参数关联的键的名称 `value` 。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class in order to return the name of the key associated with the `value` parameter. 默认实现返回 null （ `Nothing` 在 Visual Basic 中）。The default implementation returns null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). 此受保护方法只能通过此类或派生类访问。This protected method is accessible only through this class or a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认实现旨在由派生类重写，以基于 Web 服务描述语言（WSDL）规范设置适当类的父级。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to set a parent of an appropriate class, based upon the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) specification. 默认实现不执行任何操作。The default implementation performs no action. 此受保护方法只能通过此类或派生类访问。This protected method is accessible only through this class or a derived class.
